dt-option.name: columns.orderable
dt-option.summary: Enable or disable ordering on this column
dt-option.description:
Using this parameter, you can remove the end user's ability to order upon a column. This might be useful for generated content columns, for example if you have 'Edit' or 'Delete' buttons in the table.
Note that this option only effects the end user's ability to order a column. Are are still able to order a column using the `dt-init order` option or the `dt-api order()` method if required.
